channel.title: Relive06 ~ 317 ~ 2006remake ~ 15x xp rate ~ Bringing back memories
channel.description:
Relive06 ~ We are currently LIVE BETA. The server is young and growing . After months of coding we have released the Beta. Come join and be part of the fun . Currently in need of staff & loyal players. Server is brand new just released. Join NOW. Forums - http://relive06.com
Download link is on home page .
Our current Progress ~ Working highscores.
Quests are being coded and looked to be released in a short matter of time .
Fully working barrows , Hidden tunnel in chest.
Duel arena currently bugged.
95% of doors work. Report bugged .
Clue scrolls Clue level is according to monster Few clues are bugged just report.
SKILLS
2EJAV.gifCombat
PvP fully completearrow-10x10.png PvN fully completearrow-10x10.png NvN system working X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Every weapon special attack Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) Equipment requirements Degradable equipment Weapon poisoning
HhYtx.gifMagic
Every modern combat spell Every ancient combat spell Can't mage through walls Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working Charge w/ godspells Iban blast/Slayer dart Weakening spells Teleblock/binding/freezing Every other spell including: B2b/B2p Charging orbs Alching/Superheat Enchanting jewelry
C2xH2.gifRanged
Bows/arrows Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes) Crossbows (the regular one and karil's) Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)
t0SHW.gifPrayer
All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonusarrow-10x10.png affects prayer drain rate
4Ou9K.gifMining
Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Mining gems at shilo village Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg) Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting Random chance of obtaining gems Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
Bbq6R.gifSmithing
All bars can be made All bars can be forged into items All equipment can be produced Ring of forging Correct animations, interfaces and objects used HFOC2.gifFishing All fish can be caught Big net fishing Vessel fishing(put a raw karambwan as a bait in the vessel and catch karambwan) Correct item requirements Fishing spots located all around the world Correct animations Moving fishing locations Fishing Platform
Xvfj1.gifCooking
Meats Flour collecting Bread Pies Stews Pizzas Cakes Wine Hot drinks Potatoes Diary Brew making Cooking gauntlets Eating food (in pieces) Correct animation and timing used
QrNzk.gifWoodcutting
Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able Correct fell chance algorithms Birds nest falling out
0HOQK.gifFiremaking
All logs light able Adding and depleting of lightened logs Firelighters Pyre log firemaking mort'ton temple(making sacred oil) Sacred oil to make pyre logs(correct doses) All lighting sources Colored fires "Backward" firelighting Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped
YnmBh.gifAgility Can be trained but is bugged.
4jFcc.gifHerblore
Correct animations Herb Identifying All potions can be made Correct first and secondary ingredients Coconut making Item grinding(pestle use) Poisoning weapons(all types) Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)
KbkQ8.gifThieving
NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards Doors lockpicking and chests Correct animations and graphics used
5zdcP.gifCrafting
Cutting gems Making amulets, necklaces, and rings Stringing amulets and necklaces Tanning normal, hard, and dragon hide Crafting normal, hard, snakeskin, and dragon hide Crafting snakeskin Spinning wool and flax Making pottery Attaching studs
Runecrafting
Use of the Abyss Rock mining Tendrils chopping Boil burning Eyes distracting Gap crossing Passage Skulled when entering Prayer drained to 0 Dark mage repairing pouches
All altars working Correct multiple crafting Use of Pouches included Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras enchanting Combining runes and their uses Mist runes Dust runes Mud runes Smoke runes Steam runes Lava runes Binding necklace(100% of combining rune if wielded, and has 15 charges) Fletching
All logs can be fletched Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log) Can string bows Can make bolt-tips Darts Brutal arrows making Bow stringing Can make arrows
Slayer
All slayer masters Every monsters added for every tasks Burthorpe tasks Canifis tasks Edgeville tasks Lost city tasks Shilo village tasks Tips on killing monsters 'Special monsters' requires a specific slayer level and equipment to slay Slayer shops All slayer masters working Can ask for an easier task at burthorpe if you have a too hard task All equipment working Item that finishes off some monsters Equipment that are required to fight some monsters
Special monsters(Zygomite and mogre) Slayer gem working
Farming
Just released Still has some bugs

item.title: Relive06 ~ 317 ~ 2006remake ~ 15x xp rate ~ Bringing back memories
item.dc:creator: @Qu11 Qu
item.description:
@Qu11 wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:2, topic:539994”]another remake?..
at least add working photos or you wont survive in this remake competition.[/quote]

This.

Best of luck.

Read full topic

item.description:
@iFragile wrote:

Relive06 ~ We are currently LIVE BETA. The server is young and growing . After months of coding we have released the Beta. Come join and be part of the fun . Currently in need of staff & loyal players. Server is brand new just released. Join NOW.
Forums - http://relive06.com

Download link is on home page .

Our current Progress ~
Working highscores.

Quests are being coded and looked to be released in a short matter of time .

Fully working barrows , Hidden tunnel in chest.

Duel arena currently bugged.

95% of doors work. Report bugged .

Clue scrolls
Clue level is according to monster
Few clues are bugged just report.

SKILLS

2EJAV.gifCombat

PvP fully completearrow-10x10.png
PvN fully completearrow-10x10.png
NvN system working
X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)
Perfect max hit formulas
Perfect accuracy formula
Every weapon special attack
Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)
Equipment requirements
Degradable equipment
Weapon poisoning

Every modern combat spell
Every ancient combat spell
Can’t mage through walls
Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working
Charge w/ godspells
Iban blast/Slayer dart
Weakening spells
Teleblock/binding/freezing
Every other spell including:
B2b/B2p
Charging orbs
Alching/Superheat
Enchanting jewelry

Bows/arrows
Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes)

Can’t shoot through walls
Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)

Cutting gems
